name: Fields of Flux
description:
Make sure you have at least 2 Xbox controllers.

F.O.F is a 2 to 4 player brawler. Fight with your friends with one of 6 unique abilities.
Each ability transforms your character in different ways, play with them all to discover what they do!

Move with the left control stick, and Jump with A.

Attack with the face buttons, but look out when you get hit or pick up an ability, your controls will transform too!

When you are attacked you drop an ability.
Any player can Attack a dropped ability or to pick it up!
When you lose all your abilities, you’re out!
Last one standing Wins!
